title: Artistic Marathi Fonts
content:
Hi,

I am aware that the font in attached image is customized one, however, if there is any marathi font close to this, I would be glad to buy it. Please let me know such Marathi fonts - Free or Paid.

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141001085410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/20741_237376344310_1794864_n_4761.jpg)
author: pratikmehta10

comments.content: did you find this font ?? I am also looking for this.
